attributes.action: please consider waiving prescription charges to citizens who receive Disability Living Allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a UK citizen receives Income Support or Jobseeker's Allowance they are automatically entitled to free health care (waived prescription charges, eye tests etc).  It is surely wrong that somebody receiving DLA - at whatever level - is not also entitled to these charges being waived.  We therefore call for fair play where prescription charges are concerned.
